original_text: On that night could not the king sleep, and he commanded to bring the book of records of the chronicles; and they were read before the king.
korean_text: 그 날 밤에 왕이 잠이 오지 아니하므로 명령하여 역대 일기를 가져다가 자기 앞에서 읽히더니

sentences.original_text: On that night could not the king sleep
sentences.korean_translation: 그날 밤 왕은 잠을 잘 수 없었고

sentences.original_text: and he commanded to bring the book of records
and they were read before the king
